Package tanks.weapons

Class Bomb

  • java.lang.Object
    • tanks.weapons.Bomb
  • public class Bomb
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents a Bomb

      The time the Bomb was created

      The color of the Bomb

      The speed the Bomb flickers

      The y position of the Bomb
